questions.name: How many pages do you estimate we'll need to design / develop? Note: Page templates count as one page. For example, a 'Product' page template could be used for each product you offer.
How detail oriented does the animation need to be?

radio.name: Fair amount of attention to detail, but we aren't going to nit-pick
Very detailed oriented, we need to make sure all the small details are right

questions.name: Will the pages require us to create custom graphics?

radio.name: Yes, I'd love you to create illustrations for each page.
No, we'll be providing photography or using stock graphics/photos.

questions.name: Are we building any advanced functionality? Example: Integrating with an ERP, or dynamically displaying data from a database

radio.name: Yes, we'd like our website to tie into our other systems.
No, our website will be mainly lead generating / static.

questions.name: How many custom graphics will we need to create? (These are graphics we need to custom design and that can't be found via stock sites or provided by client).
Are we creating the overall style of the report or is there already a defined style guide?

radio.name: Yes, we need you to create an overall style for the report.
No, we have a defined style guide for you to use.

questions.name: Do you need us to make the document 508 compliant?

radio.name: Yes, we need to comply with Section 508 Accessibility Standards.
No, we don't need to have 508 compliance.

questions.name: How many minutes will the video be?
How polished do you want the video to be?

radio.name: I'm not looking for anything crazyâ€”just professional.
I don't need Hollyood, but it should be pretty cinematic.
I want Hollywood level of production
